blogPost.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
blogPost.body: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
blogPost.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗

"Hi mom, margin is on the phone and they would like to speak with you."

-Liam, Robinhood trader since April 2020

localize.full_text:
"嗨，妈妈，保证金在电话里，他们想和你谈谈。"

-Liam，Robinhood交易员，自2020年4月起。

"嗨，媽媽，保證金在電話裏，他們想和你談談。"

-Liam，Robinhood交易員，自2020年4月起。

next.title:
The sell-off in high momentum stocks over the past few weeks is more than 3x larger than the broad market.

This is the sharpest momentum downturn on a relative basis that we've seen in quite some time.

$MTUM $SPY

localize.full_text:
过去几周高动量股的抛售幅度是大盘的3倍多。

这是我们在相当长一段时间内看到的相对基础上最剧烈的动量下跌。

$MTUM $SPY

通过@ycharts绘制图表 https://t.co/WjYEabEv8j

過去幾周高動量股的拋售幅度是大盤的3倍多。

這是我們在相當長一段時間內看到的相對基礎上最劇烈的動量下跌。

$MTUM $SPY
